ask_assistant.description: Ask a GPT assistant anything you want!

props.name: assistant
props.description: The assistant which will generate the completion.

props.name: memoryKey
props.description: A memory key that will keep the chat history shared across runs and flows. Keep it empty to leave your assistant without memory of previous messages.

extract-structured-data.description: Returns structured data from provided unstructured text.

props.name: params
props.description: Provide the name of the value you want to extract from the unstructured text. The name should be unique and short.

props.name: propName
props.description: Provide the name of the value you want to extract from the unstructured text. The name should be unique and short.

props.name: propDescription
props.description: Brief description of the data, this hints for the AI on what to look for

props.name: propDataType
props.description: Type of parameter.

generate_image.description: Generate an image using text-to-image models

props.name: model
props.description: The model which will generate the image.

props.name: resolution
props.description: The resolution to generate the image in.

props.name: quality
props.description: Standard is faster, HD has better details.

props.name: model
props.description: The model which will generate the completion. Some models are suitable for natural language tasks, others specialize in code.

props.name: temperature
props.description: Controls randomness: Lowering results in less random completions. As the temperature approaches zero, the model will become deterministic and repetitive.

props.name: maxTokens
props.description: The maximum number of tokens to generate. Requests can use up to 2,048 or 4,096 tokens shared between prompt and completion depending on the model. Don't set the value to maximum and leave some tokens for the input. (One token is roughly 4 characters for normal English text)

props.name: topP
props.description: An alternative to sampling with temperature, called nucleus sampling, where the model considers the results of the tokens with top_p probability mass. So 0.1 means only the tokens comprising the top 10% probability mass are considered.

props.name: frequencyPenalty
props.description: Number between -2.0 and 2.0. Positive values penalize new tokens based on their existing frequency in the text so far, decreasing the model's likelihood to repeat the same line verbatim.

props.name: presencePenalty
props.description: Number between -2.0 and 2.0. Positive values penalize new tokens based on whether they appear in the text so far, increasing the mode's likelihood to talk about new topics.

props.name: memoryKey
props.description: A memory key that will keep the chat history shared across runs and flows. Keep it empty to leave ChatGPT without memory of previous messages.

props.name: roles
props.description: Array of roles to specify more accurate response

text_to_speech.description: Generate an audio recording from text

props.name: text
props.description: The text you want to hear.

props.name: model
props.description: The model which will generate the audio.

props.name: speed
props.description: The speed of the audio. Minimum is 0.25 and maximum is 4.00.

props.name: voice
props.description: The voice to generate the audio in.

props.name: format
props.description: The format you want the audio file in.

props.name: fileName
props.description: The name of the output audio file (without extension).

transcribe.description: Transcribe audio to text using whisper-1 model

props.name: audio
props.description: Audio file to transcribe

props.name: language
props.description: Language of the audio file the default is en (English).

translate.description: Translate audio to text using whisper-1 model

props.name: audio
props.description: Audio file to translate
